title: I Was A Bitch
description: What if you woke up having forgotten the last two years of your life?After a horrific accident Lacey Jones has to try piece together her shattered past. With no memory of the previous two years she finds herself in a relationship with a man she doesnâ€™t know, and with a reputation for being the Queen Bitch of High-School. She decides to keep the secret of her memory loss until she can figure out what happened in these two years she lost, trusting only the mysterious and sexy Finn to help her, but will she continue being that bitch or will she decide to rewrite her story?
author: Emily Ruben
